mapper.sql: id, order_no, express_type, express_id, express_code, amount, created_time, trade_summary, status, notify_url, suc_time, version
mapper.insert:
insert into order_info
id,
order_no,
express_type,
express_id,
express_code,
amount,
created_time,
trade_summary,
status,
notify_url,
suc_time,
version,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{expressType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{expressId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{expressCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{tradeSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{notifyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sucTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update order_info
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
express_type = #{expressType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
express_id = #{expressId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
express_code = #{expressCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
trade_summary = #{tradeSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
notify_url = #{notifyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
suc_time = #{sucTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update order_info set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, express_type = #{expressType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, express_id = #{expressId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, express_code = #{expressCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, trade_summary = #{tradeSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, notify_url = #{notifyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suc_time = #{sucTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select o.* from order_info o
and o.status = #{status}
and o.order_no like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY o.created_time desc
